scripts.servers: npm run backend & npm run pumlServer
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules; rm -rf dist; rm -rf package-lock.json
scripts.testAll: npm run testEvalSd & npm run testSeqD & npm run testSD & npm run testRedCart & npm run testDobot & npm run testGateway
scripts.testSeqD: npm run build  & npm start "./example-input/SeqD-examples/SeqDs" "./example-input/SeqD-examples/TDs.json" & tsc -b ./created-output/SeqD-examples/tsconfig.json
scripts.testSD: npm run build  & npm start "./example-input/SD-examples/SDs" tsc -b ./created-output/SD-examples/tsconfig.json
scripts.testRedCart: npm run build  & npm start "./example-input/Evaluation/RedCart/SeqDs" "./example-input/Evaluation/RedCart/TDs.json" & tsc -b ./created-output/Evaluation/RedCart/tsconfig.json
scripts.testDobot: npm run build  & npm start "./example-input/Evaluation/DoBot/SeqDs" "./example-input/Evaluation/DoBot/TDs.json" & tsc -b ./created-output/Evaluation/DoBot/tsconfig.json
scripts.testGateway: npm run build  & npm start "./example-input/Evaluation/Gateway/SeqDs" "./example-input/Evaluation/Gateway/TDs.json" & tsc -b ./created-output/Evaluation/Gateway/tsconfig.json
scripts.testEvalSd: npm run build  & npm start "./example-input/Evaluation/Gateway/SDs" & npm start "./example-input/Evaluation/RedCart/SDs" & npm start "./example-input/Evaluation/DoBot/SDs"
